General.Name: AOI Electronics Co. Ltd
General.Description: AOI Electronics Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells electronic parts in Japan. It offers integrated circuits, modules, thick film thermal print heads, optical sensors, LED products, chip resistor networks, and micro electro mechanical system devices. The company was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Takamatsu, Japan.

1.Name: Mr. Kazuhiro  Kinoshita
1.Title: MD, GM of Admin. Division & Representative Director

4.Title: GM of Takamatsu 2nd Production Division & Director
